tool_description: Fast, accurate, reliable , Easy to integrate, available in JSON, XML, CSV,
name: IP Geolocation APIs
title: IP Geolocation APIs

api_list.name: IP Location of Client /  Visitor
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ip-geolocation-apis.p.rapidapi.com/json/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ip-geolocation-apis.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: IP Lookup (XML)
api_list.description: Provides geo information for the given IPv4/IPv6

optional_parameters.name: lang
optional_parameters.description:
lang (ISO 639)	description
en	English (default)
de	Deutsch (German)
es	Español (Spanish)
pt-BR	Português - Brasil (Portuguese)
fr	Français (French)
ja	日本語 (Japanese)
zh-CN	中国 (Chinese)
ru	Русский (Russian)
